string.text: Hey!
Hey!
Where's the money for the mission?
Find my deputy and you'll get your money!
OK but don't lie to me this time!
Who are you?
Leha the Jaw is my name! These rogues are my crew!
What are you doing here?
My boys and I are resting! When we're done we'll head to Pripyat!
What do you know about Pripyat?
It's an old abandoned city from the communist era! From history! I reckon it's full of monsters and hordes of "Monolith" fighters now! No one who has gone there before ever returned!
You think it's dangerous?
No doubt about it - nobody has ever come back from there.
You seen any soldiers around?
No, I ain't seen any soldiers for a long time.
What about military stalkers?

Rumour has it that they showed up right by the Red Forest, by the antennae! When they were turned off many people went to the Red Forest and further into Pripyat! We've been here for a day and we haven't seen anyone. Someone probably blocked the road here.
You think the military blocked the road to the Red Forest?

I don't think it was the military, I haven't seen any for a long time but military stalkers could have done it! They don't waste any time. They're the no-nonsense types, they work quickly and efficiently in their teams or solo... it's weird that they didn't block the road here earlier.
Why did they not go to Pripyat or block the road there?
I don't know. Maybe they're afraid or they're getting ready for something. I can only guess.
Maybe you've got a mission for me?
Well, I have one but it's not easy...will you do it?
Saying it's not easy doesn't scare me!
Nah, no way. I don't have the time!
I understand. I'm afraid myself... would prefer to spend some money instead of sending my guys or going myself.

Good! The job is to find my scouts, Crowbar and Log! They went to Pripyat since I decided not to rush in and sent my best guys instead! Find them alive and bring them here. If they're dead bring me their weapons! Do this for me and you'll get 2000!!!
OK, deal!
Not enough. How about 4000 and we have a deal?
That's all I can offer you for this job!
OK, I'll wait for you here!
Mission accomplished!
Great, give me his PDA!
Here. Now the money!
You're trying to pull a fast one on me. He didn't have anything!
I'm gonna waste you right now!
If I see you again you're a dead man!
OK, I understand. Good luck!
I can't give you anything, I don't have any money. You can keep his stuff if you want.
I don't have any money! Go away!
I couldn't find him!
Find him fast if you want your money!
I found your boys. They died but here are their weapons!
Thanks, they're dead then. I don't think there's any point going to Pripyat now! There's a problem though - I don't have your money. My deputy disappeared and he had all the money!
OK, I'll find him! Tell me where to look for him. And don't even think about trying to cheat me out of my cash this time!!!
I don't think he got very far. He's probably here or here, I'll mark it on the map for you! When you find him, bring him or his PDA back here!
OK, wait for me!!!
I couldn't find them.
Find them fast! I can't wait forever!!! Good luck!
Oh, man! Glad to see you! Feel much better now.
Hello. Lukash is awaiting you, go to base.
Not so fast, man, we're trapped. I'm here with the guys from about a week, beasts surrounded us. We can't escape!
What beasts?
Red Forest mutants. Huge waves every day. Look at this mess. We're getting out of ammo, food, guys are almost exausted... You came really in time.
That's strange... Why they attack you like that?

I don't know, but... Something strange here. We came here a week ago, like I said. Came from the Warehouses through Red Forest and stopped here because of strong emission ahead. Made a camp here. There is an entrance in some tunnel nearby, but door is closed... So when we decided to get out of here, suddenly huge waves of mutants started to attack us, one followed by another. We're stucked here! And this place is strange, my head is killing me and those nightmares... Fidel already got sick.
Yeah, I already noticed something bad here.
Right. We believed, that Lukash will send some reinforcements, and here you are.
Reinforcements? Yeah, I guess... Look, is Owl with you?
Yes, he is. As a corpse. Died in first wave of beasts. Let God rest his soul in piece...
Where is his body?
In the tunnel near the APC. Can't bury him because of this whole shit.
He had a flash, didn't he?
Yes, he had. I kept it, but have no time to check it out. Wait... What's that?
What's hapenning?
Shit! Scanner indicating mutants again! Stalker, help us to stand, my fellows can barely grab the guns. If you do - I'll give you that flash.
I'm with you.
Reinforcements? Yeah, I guess... Listen, I looked for Filin, but apparently, I'm late...
Yeah... He was torn apart by beasts in first day here. Let God rest in piece for his soul...
I need his flash. Searched him, but didn't find anything.
Yes, he worry about you.
Pseudogiants are dead. I hope, that was the final wave.
Oh, man, I hope so too!
Yeah. Listen, what's that the door in the tunnel you talked about?
Oh, that... We wanted to escape through it first, but it's closed. Our handyman Che investigated it and said that door isn't locked, but we were unable to open the door.
I can look at it.
It became rusty, I guess
Anytime, be my guest.
May be. As a scout I can tell you that door was opened last time a long long time ago.
Need to look at it.
Well, how are you?
I'm fine... Those were a big boars, never saw any like that.
Me neither.
Ok, let... Wait... Are you kidding me? Another wave! We just fought back, I can't understand...
Take your guns! We'll kill that bastards!
Barely made it. Good weapon could be handy now...
Oh, man! I inestigated an old APC and found a couple of landmines. You can get them and install them on the road to the camp, you never know what's next.
Hm, why not. Where're those mines?
In wagon, in the box on the bench.
Good shooting.
Yeah.
You didn't say that waves came so often.
It's just today. Before you came we wasted only three waves. It's unusual. I think...
What?
Holy shit! Again! This can't be happening, man?!
Calm down! I'll take it.
I'm back.
What's with that door?
It's very strange... Don't know what to say. Seems that somebody behind that door...
Honestly, I'm afraid of it. Let's... Oh, shit...
What, another wave??
No... Head... My head!...
Oh, shit!
What the hell was this?
Oh, my head... I don't know, some unknown beast...
Looks like some strange controller.

Wait... I got it. There is a tale about some strange half mutant - half human creature living underground and reffered as Master. Master of what he is - I don't know, stalkers said that he's master of all Zone creatures. Looks like he can't exit from the underground because of us and he summoned mutants to us. That's why we felt like shit and fought mutants every day. Something like that.
Yeah, he could be the "master" of our brains soon...
Exactly! Look, take this from us for your help - It'll be never forgotten. If you see Lukash - tell him, what happened.
Of course. And also Owl's flash.
Right, I forgot it. Take it.
Thanks.
Of course.
